open.description: Whether or not the `<Portal />` is open

onOpen.description: Callback fired when `<Portal />` content has been mounted in the DOM. Ha the Portal DOMNode as parameter.

onClose.description: Callback fired when `<Portal />` has been unmounted from the DOM

mountNode.description:
An element or a function returning an element to use as the mount node
for the `<Portal />` (defaults to `document.body`)

insertAt.description: Insert the element at the 'top' of the mountNode or at the 'bottom'

children.description: The children to be rendered within the `<Portal />`

elementRef.description: Provides a reference to the underlying html element. Has the Portal DOMNode as parameter.

title: Portal
